desc: Students work intensively on a special topic in mathematics. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered annually.
name: Sem: Differential Geometry
notes: Prerequisite: Math 226 or permission of instructor.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Math 226 or permission of instructor.

title: Topics in Mathematics
